reviews.text: Great addition to the neighborhood! The mezze and the kunefe are a must try *drool*. And the service is impeccable. Rania went above and beyond to make sure we have a great experience.
Absolutely delicious food! Always fresh and served with a smile.

Food, service, atmosphere were great! Loved it! We ordered a baklava for dessert wasn‚Äôt as good but everything else was great! I got the chicken chops and a margarita! Plus an appetizer dish that contains a mixture of cheeses along with tomatoes.
Great vibe, very tasty traditional food. Very friendly staff. A must visit.
amazing food ! and Rania the hostess she is a beautiful person and great hospitality
Amazing food and great experience with belly dancing! Ranya, our server, was the best!
Very nice atmosphere, great food and Ranya was the best
Really good! Loved the mixed grill.
Amazing in all areas; service, atmosphere and especially the food, which is very tasty and on point everytime. Best of all, they always treat you like family from the moment you walk in.

The food was absolutely AMAZING!!! And the atmosphere was stunning! Our server Abraham went above and beyond every chance he got!! Phenomenal place! I will return here, and I‚Äôm from Pennsylvania!!!!!
Abraham was amazing!!! Awesome service!
Amazing spot! Abraham was an awesome waiter. Highly recommend this place
Great food and great experience. Highly recommend!

Food wasn‚Äôt bad but with the worst service how can anything be good . We were completely ignored for 20 minutes not to mention it was not busy and during the week ! ! And the Music was head banging rock . And too loud .. no i am not old ..just not appropriate at dinner .Just a terrible experience!! No need to go with so many better mid east restaurants in Bay Ridge !

The place was wonderful
We enjoyed the food , service was great
Our hostess was very accommodating with great recs
Had a wonderful experience having a family lunch. Food was delicious, and service was great! Would come back!
This was our first visit to Laila. We had a lovely server Rainia who suggested dishes for us to try, all of which were exceptional. Highly recommend this excellent restaurant.
So good, our fave Syrian in the city
great
Place was beautiful  atmosphere was nice BUT FOOD WAS AWFUL COLD AND NOT GOOD. EXCEPT FOR THE SALAD THAT WAS GOOD. I WOULD NOT GO BACK OR RECCOMMEND.food was ice cold .lamb was gamey.
Delicious food! Served hot, great service! Rania was amazing!

This place is very welcoming and has a great atmosphere, celebrating my birthday. The cocktails was very good too. I was very surprised with the piece of cake with the sparkling candle. Rania was very polite and kind. Will be definitely coming back here
Delicious! I have found a new go to restaurant in the neighborhood! Excellent food, generous portions and beautiful atmosphere. They have a kids menu which is also a huge plus for families!
Great place! Love the food and service,
Food was great! The entire staff was very kind and checked up on us a lot to make sure everything was perfect. Rania was especially attentive! First time dinning here and excited to come back.
Food was great

This restaurant was amazing. Literally some of the best food I have ever eaten. The host Sahar was beyond hospitable, we also had a lovely Algerian waiter, wish I could remember his name! The whole staff was truthfully so warm and inviting. The building is also stunning, a warm and trendy place with food that literally blew my mind! 10/10 for me and my whole family!
Really good food with big portions
very yummy food and great service!
Good food and great service and the atmosphere is really good!

Rania is amazing. The food was beyond excellent. Syrian food, great service and perfect location. Beautiful decor and everyone was so nice to us! You have to try the shawarma. So authentic. We‚Äôre coming back next week.
Food is great, service is great, totally recommend

The food is absolutely spectacular ‚Äî and the lunch menu is just as impressive! Cyril is wonderful: kind, attentive, and incredibly knowledgeable when it comes to cocktails. He was such a pleasure to talk to and went above and beyond to make our experience special.

When I mentioned that my favorite drink was Vimto, he not only created his own unique spin on it but even went across the street to get some for me ‚Äî talk about exceptional service!

I had a truly lovely experience and will definitely be back. Highly recommend ‚Äî food, service, and atmosphere are all a 10/10.
Amazing is al I can say and Arda is a class act

Food was excellent.  The wait staff was very friendly.  Prices were reasonable.  Atmosphere was perfect for a nice meal. Rania was super helpful with recommendations for dinner and dessert. The lamb chops were the favorite entree.
Great food and ambiance
Servers  Rania and abdo are amazing. Must visit.
You‚Äôll find better selections at a much better price in the freezer at Trader Joe‚Äôs. Friendlier service too.
Food was delicious , so many flavors in one bite . The atmosphere is beautiful and the service here is amazing, super sweet staff and very attentive
Nice atmosphere and delicious food! Rania‚Äôs service was excellent. We will be back!
Rania and our other server were so helpful and a delight to have. Our food was amazing and our experience was as well.
Ranya is an absolute gem she made sure we were taken care of all night long and made it a night to remember
The food was very tasty and had generous portions. The service was great, fast, and attentive. Would definitely recommend
Amazing place! Best shawerma in NYC and you MUST try the cocktails here. Delicious and Arab inspired just wow
Restaurant is beautiful. Food is good and staff is very kind.

This was my first time visiting because my friend really wanted to come here for her birthday dinner, and unfortunately it was a very disappointing experience. Toward the end of the evening, the staff asked if we wanted to place anything before the kitchen closed, and we ordered a main dish for my friend. However, the order was never brought to the table. After waiting for almost an hour with no updates‚Äîand without anyone checking in to offer water or ask if we needed anything‚Äîwe asked about the dish. At that point, we were told the kitchen had already closed and that the order had never even been placed.

The food we did receive was fine, but the lack of attention, communication, and basic service overshadowed the entire visit. For a first impression, this was very disappointing, and I hope the restaurant works on training its staff to be more attentive and reliable.
beautiful place with really great food. The staff was so hospitable and kind, including Ranya! Will definitely come back again ü´∂üèº
Always tremendous, try the fresh tabbouleh!  the management and owner are so nice. Come and introduce yourselves!!!
my wife threw my 40th surprise bday party here and it was absolutely perfect.

Food was delicious but seemed like they were understaffed.

We were a large party with a reservation (believe 8 of us total, but there were other large tables celebrating birthdays at the same time as us. When we were seated we were able to order drinks, then we ordered appetizers, and then ordered entrees. Appetizers came before drinks and did not get water until we asked for it. Waitress was also apologetic when she spilled the appetizer and brought us a new one. When entrees came a while later we tried to order more drinks but nobody came to our table for a long time. After we ordered second round of drinks, we noticed it took a while and the bar ended up running out of glasses. There was also only 1 bartender for the whole restaurant of many tables and additional people sitting st the bar. There should probably be more than 1 on prime Saturday night.

Dj was awesome though! Everyone was nice, but very clear they were understaffed for the night. Food was delicious, and we all left full. Spent a little over $100 per person. We all shared apps and entrees, got 1-2 drinks per person as well.

This is THE spot, truly wholeheartedly. If it‚Äôs your first day in Brooklyn or even if you‚Äôve lived here a thousand years, even if this was your very first experience with food, you have to come here. Starting from the basics, the ambience and the overall air of the environment invites you in. There‚Äôs a section facing the outside that has the most gorgeous canopy of greenery and it becomes even more beautiful as the evening approaches and the table lighting flourishes. The food is divine, and the service even more so. Each worker has their own story to tell and the warmest energy. If it was my first time dining here, I would just put all my trust into Rania and Roger and let the show of flavors commence. Tina provided such sweet and very patient service, she was so helpful and kind. Arda is a very thoughtful and kind bartender with magical talents who produces absolute artwork and mastery of the craft. They are all so amazing, with the best smiles and friendliest interactions. And it‚Äôs truly a beautiful spirit that flows through the space, the people, and the food.

I had a wonderful experience at Laila Restaurant in Bay Ridge! The food was absolutely delicious, especially the authentic Syrian dishes ü§åüèºü§§ full of flavor and beautifully presented. The ambiance was warm, welcoming, and truly added to the overall dining experience. You can tell a lot of care goes into both the food and the atmosphere. Highly recommend if you're looking for amazing Middle Eastern cuisine in Brooklyn!

Laila Restaurant is an absolute gem in Brooklyn. From the moment you walk in, the ambiance sweeps you away ‚Äî warm, inviting, and beautifully curated with an atmosphere that feels both chic and intimate.

The food is nothing short of extraordinary. Every dish is crafted with precision, bursting with flavor, and presented like a work of art. You can truly taste the quality and love in each bite ‚Äî it‚Äôs the kind of meal that lingers in your memory long after you‚Äôve finished.

The service is impeccable. The staff goes above and beyond to make you feel welcomed, attentive without ever being overbearing. They have that rare ability to make the entire dining experience feel seamless and personal.

Laila isn‚Äôt just a restaurant ‚Äî it‚Äôs an experience. Whether you‚Äôre coming for a special occasion, a date night, or just to treat yourself, this is the place that sets the bar for excellence in Brooklyn dining. Food, ambiance, and service: top of the top.

Highly, highly recommended.

Delicious Syrian food! Beautiful atmosphere, attentive and welcoming staff! The fatoush salad was beyond expectations, the grilled meat was delicious ! I don‚Äôt recommend the liver, it was not as expected. The pastries come with 4 tiny pieces and it‚Äôs over priced. Overall, the food was great!

Incredible food and service. Easily the best Arab food I‚Äôve had outside of the Middle East. We came late on a Saturday night and Rania greeted us and let us order before the kitchen closed. She even helped us choose foods she recommended. Everything was delicious, fresh, and tender. My husband and I were in a food and flavor coma. We tried to leave a cash tip but she was honest and told us on Friday and Saturday night an 18% tip was included. We wouldn‚Äôt have caught that on the receipt so that was kind of her. Still left a little extra cash for the busboys. I would definitely come back here and next time save room for dessert!

Had a delightful experience at Laila‚Äôs
The spicy kebab was delicious and the service was so wonderful and friendly. I finished with delicious pistachio cheesecake. I love my Syrian food.

Can‚Äôt even start telling how EXCELLENT the food and services are here! Rania went out of her way to provide an amazing service for me, especially that I‚Äôm from outta town.  Y‚Äôall have to come and try it. Highly recommended it. Thank you for everything! I will come back.

It was my first time visiting this location. The food was amazing, there was a belly dancer performing, and absolutely love the way the restaurant is decorated. Will definitely be returning and bringing my family/friends. Kristina was our waitress and she was attentive and helpful when ordering. All of the staff was excellent!!

I am visiting from Los Angeles and was invited to Laila at Bayridge. Place was absolutely packed. I loved the hospitality bread and spicy olives in the beginning . The tabouli was incredible as were the other appetisers. My shish taowk plate was very tasty and colorful. I got to meet the owner Alaa and he was a very kind and generous man. The Knafeh desert at the end was absolutely perfect, just the right temperature and sweetness not drenched with strop with pistachios on top. Laila was a great experience. Highly recommended.

I was wowed by everything as a Syrian. The restaurant is elegant and perfect for celebration dinners. The service is excellent. The food is gourmet, some of the best Syrian restaurant food I‚Äôve ever had. The stand outs for me were the hummus- creamiest I‚Äôve ever had, and the interactive fatoush that you break yourself. The filet mignon I got was tender and the seasoned fries were tasty. They have a huge menu so there‚Äôs always more to explore. I recommend this place for a special occasion, date, or birthday. I can‚Äôt wait to show my friends this spot so they can really celebrate and experience my culture.

I had an absolutely amazing experience at Laila, a Syrian restaurant that truly impressed me from start to finish!

The food was phenomenal‚Äîrich, flavorful, and authentically prepared. Every dish was a delight, from the creamy hummus to the perfectly seasoned kebabs and fresh, warm bread. You can taste the love and tradition in every bite!

The staff was incredibly attentive and welcoming, ensuring that we had everything we needed throughout the night. Their hospitality made the evening even more enjoyable.

The entertainment was top-notch‚Äîa talented belly dancer captivated the crowd, and the DJ kept the energy high with great music that made the atmosphere lively and fun.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place with delicious food, outstanding service, and an unforgettable ambiance, Laila is the perfect spot. I highly recommend it!!! Will be coming back very soon!!! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Update- it‚Äôs still great here !

The service was outstanding. Shout out to our server for being warm and welcoming!

Price was right for the amount of food that we did get. Get the grilled octopus and liver and the chicken shawarma!

My husband and I went to lunch at Laila‚Äôs and it was absolutely delicious. We ordered hummus for app and shared a lamb shawarma. The service was awesome. Roger was very tentative and even gave us more sauce for our leftovers. Totally recommend this place.

Where are you going to find a better Middle Eastern place in Bay Ridge? It‚Äôs a serious question with a very simple answer and that answer is Laila of Bayridge. Awesome lamb chops amazing drinks and you must must try the Makdous. Enjoy!

The ambience was absolutely beautiful! The food was amazingly good! The service was equally great. The belly dancer was the icing of the evening and overall my sister had a wonderfully birthday dinner. It‚Äôs a must have spot if you‚Äôre in Brooklyn!!

Amazing restaurant! Service was 10/10. Super attentive and friendly.

The laila mixed platter and skewers were so flavorful and tender. The rice was soft and fluffy.
Alan‚Äôs chicken was such a big portion with soft fries and a lot of chicken pieces.

Big servings! 10/10 will come again.

I love exploring Bay Ridge and checking out new spots and I‚Äôve been wanting to try Syrian food for a while. So glad I finally made it to Laila! The vibe inside was beautiful (major bonus), but the food totally blew me away. From the fatoush salad to the dips and that Laila meat combo‚Ä¶ every bite had us saying wow. So worth it!
The food was excellent and the place is great. Rania was our server and was very good. Highly recommend the hummus and the lamb chops. We will definitely be back!

Loved the appetizer! Everything was so full of flavor!
Serving size of main meal was very generous.

We had an absolutely wonderful dining experience at Laila today! From the moment we walked in, we were impressed by the beautiful ambiance‚Äîit‚Äôs the perfect place for a special meal.

Our server, Nemat, was truly exceptional. He was attentive, kind, and went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. He was especially sweet to our daughter, making her feel special throughout the meal, which meant so much to us as a family.

The food was delicious, and to top it off, they surprised us with a dessert! It was such a thoughtful touch that made our visit even more memorable. 10/10

Not bad at all.
I don‚Äôt have a comparison with other syrian restaurantes, but this was a good choice.

It was saturday at lunch/dinner time, and there was some nice dj music.

The place is clean, the staff is polite.
Portions are good!!!

Only note: I realised that they were trying hard to upsell things.
Plus: when we asked for a specific table, they told us there was a reservation - when they simply  didn‚Äôt want us to sit there

Anyhow, I Would go back to try more!

I don‚Äôt even know where to begin this place became one of my favorite place! The atmosphere the food and service is above and beyond! Thank you so much for the welcoming and delicious dinner. Rania was the most sweetest person I met, she was very helpful and kind giving advice on what to order and checking up each time. Thank you love ‚ù§Ô∏è

All the kind things I read about this place turned out to be true, food was excellent, staff was friendly. Upscale for Bay Ridge but not at all pretentious. Nice to have something elevated in the Ridge. Looking forward to going back and trying more dishes. Pro tip, sit by the windows and people-watch one of the busiest corners in Bay Ridge.

The octopus cut like warmed butter and was one of the best things I‚Äôve ever put in my mouth. Hummus has a wonderful complex umami to it that hit the back palate and kept me coming back for more. The muhammara was also fantastic - beautifully sweet and silky with a walnut crunch. Can‚Äôt wait to come back.

We had a wonderful experience at Laila - the Syrian restaurant. The food was absolutely delicious, authentic, flavorful, and clearly made with care!
Our server was also incredibly kind and attentive, and made us feel right at home!

The grilled meats, sambousek and knafeh were incredible!
Highly recommend!

Absolutely loved!!!! The food was amazing and the service was great, we had the fatoush salad (covered in a pita that you break), Laila combo, kibbeh, chicken shawarma and fattet makdous. Definitely recommend this place and we will be coming back!
Rania was an amazing host. Keep her around. My first time in Brooklyn. So far the best host I have had!! Thank you Rania.

This was my second time at Laila in Bayridge and I‚Äôm so glad I came back! The food was absolutely delicious‚Äîso fresh, full of flavor, and clearly made with quality ingredients. It‚Äôs always a great feeling when a place lives up to (or even exceeds) expectations. The service was just as wonderful, friendly, attentive, and welcoming. It‚Äôs the kind of spot that makes you feel right at home. Can‚Äôt wait for my next visit!
Amazing food, friendly staff. Delicious cocktails, couldn‚Äôt ask for more.

I‚Äôm coming here everyday!!! I had the most incredible octopus and mezze platter. The food was fresh and flavorful and I feel the perfect amount of full. They kept giving us fresh pita. The service is phenomenal, everyone is so friendly and attentive and we had the best recommendations and service! Get the tea!
Great food and service. We ordered Fatoush for Appetizer and it was delicious same as dinner.
I‚Äôm very glad Laila Bay Ridge is here! My friend and I ordered small plates tapas-style, and every dish was perfectly balanced and delicious. Rania was delightful, and the atmosphere was perfect.

Great new spot for date night. The decor was classy modern. Great vibes, excellent food, and attentive service.The Syrian hummus was delicious and abundant. The meat from the chicken shawarma was tender with nicely seasoned fries. They offer a variety of drinks and mocktails. The belly dancer was an added bonus.

Great Middle Eastern restaurant in Bay Ridge! They have a huge variety of fresh, delicious salads and some amazing traditional dishes. The food was so good!
The service was even better than expected‚Äîeveryone was super kind and welcoming. The place is beautiful, and it‚Äôs a great spot to eat and enjoy with friends.
Only thing is, the prices are a bit high, other than that, everything was great.

This vibrant spot offers a great experience. Enjoy generous portions of delicious food, refreshing drinks (alcohol is served), captivating belly dancing performances, and the relaxing ambiance of hookah. It's the perfect place to unwind and have a good time.
Delicious food, fun and yummy drinks, and such a great atmosphere. First time here and will definitely be back!

First time here, last night - Friday at 6pm . I had a large group 16 people on a Friday night. Not only did they go above and beyond to accommodate me- the service was excellent- but that‚Äôs all nice and all- here‚Äôs the best part- the food is phenomenal. Food is seriously legit- it taste like someone‚Äôs grandmother made each dish- the quality and portions are excellent. Food is super flavorful without being overly seasoned- good quality cuts of meat- I highly recommend all the appetizers - all the lamb dishes-fattet Mozat-  shish tawook-mix grill- meat shawarma platter, no joke everything is insanely good. There‚Äôs quite a few Lebanese Syrian and Palestinian places in bay ridge - none of them come even close to this. Also on a Friday night 8pm they had a belly dancer who was wonderful- can‚Äôt wait to come back. Portions are huge and prices are fair and on par with the quality of the food- also fyi- there‚Äôs a full bar for those who drink alcohol. Excellent to bring kids - we had 8 kids in our group of 17

I‚Äôm so sorry my 1st attempt at a review was not saved and now I‚Äôve forgotten the owner‚Äòs name. Thank you! As well as Neman and all! The food was excellent, so delicious and the staff lovely as well as funny. I especially loved the salad that was so fresh and full of herbs. I‚Äôm moving but will definitely make the trip back here! Thank you!!

I‚Äôm very impressed with the food and the quality of the service. Great job üëè we really enjoyed. Please order humus and babagonush best appetizers that I tried in Brooklyn so far. The have Dj too playing good music must try place in Brooklyn üëèüëç‚ò∫Ô∏è

truly impressed. The staff was exceptionally friendly, the food was absolutely delicious, and the drinks were delightful. The atmosphere was stunning, making the whole experience even more enjoyable. I‚Äôm so happy I discovered this place, and I highly recommend it‚Äî100% worth it!‚Äù
Fabulous place to dine. Great music, had everyone dancing at their tables. The food is delicious.

Delicious Syrian food; make sure to order the muhamara- it is incredible and nobody else makes it this way in Brooklyn. The kanef was crispy with a perfect cheese pull. What a treat! Staff was friendly, decor is gorgeous. Will be back!
